text: bhalaee ye nahin hai ki tum apana mukh poorv athava pashchim kee or pher lo! bhala karm to usaka hai, jo allaah aur antim din (pralay) par eemaan laaya tatha farishton, sab pustakon, nabiyon par (bhee eemaan laaya), dhan ka moh rakhate hue, sameepavartiyon, anaathon, nirdhanon, yaatriyon tatha yaachakon (kaafiron) ko aur daas mukti ke lie diya, namaaz kee sthaapana kee, zakaat dee, apane vachan ko, jab bhee vachan diya, poora karate rahe evan nirdhanata aur rog tatha yudhd kee sthiti mein dhairyavaan rahe. yahee log sachche hain tatha yahee (allaah se) darate[1] hain
